flavorText: Every page holds a month, every date a numeral.
name: Bronze Calendar
originalText:
Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
You must speak in a voice other than your normal voice.
When you speak in your normal voice, sacrifice Bronze Calendar.

rulings.text: If you control more than one Bronze Calendar, speaking in one voice that isn’t your normal voice will satisfy the requirements of all of them.
You may change voices as often as you wish, as long as you avoid the one you use normally.
